text: because that they have forsaken me, and have worshipped Ashtoreth the goddess of the Sidonians, Chemosh the god of Moab, and Milcom the god of the children of Ammon; and they have not walked in my ways, to do that which is right in mine eyes, and <FI>to keep<Fi> my statutes and mine ordinances, as did David his father.
name: I Kings 11:33
